item.description:
See: Over 70 exhibitors displaying products and services specifically designed to enhance single living. Yes, the Boston Beanstalks is an exhibitor.

Attend: 10 free educational seminars dealing with issues and topics that concern today's singles.

Experience: New England's largest singles dance. Your chance to meet and mingle with hundreds of interesting contemporary singles.

Pick-Up: Your free copy of the show directory that will feature ads from singles groups and organizations.

Enjoy: Speed dating sessions. Your chance to meet lots of new singles.

Schedule:
2:00 PM: Registration Opens
2:00 PM - 4:00 PM: Set-up for Exhibitors
3:00 PM - 8:00 PM: Seminars & Workshops
4:00 PM - 7:00 PM: Exhibits Open
5:00 PM - 8:00 PM: Speed Dating
8:00 PM - Midnight: Dance Party

Cost: $15 in advance or $20 at the door. However, Marie has several free VIP Passes and lots of "2 for 1" passes. Contact her in advance or come to "First Friday" to check on availability.

Register on line at Singles Expo, then click on "Singles Expo" in the yellow box on the right side of the screen. (Please Note: "2 for 1" passes can only be used at the door or via snail mail. They cannot be used online.)
item.name: Singles' Lifestyle Expo - New England
